Title: Heartfelt
Writer: David Shore (developed by), Jae-Beom Park (based on the Korean Broadcasting System television series by), Johanna Lee, Thomas L. Moran, Johanna Lee (executive story editor), David Renaud (story editor), Karen Struck (story editor), Lloyd Gilyard Jr. (staff writer)
Actors: Freddie Highmore, Nicholas Gonzalez, Antonia Thomas, Chuku Modu
Plot: A teenage patient hopes the surgical team can free her from a life of confinement at home; a young patient's perfectly matched organ donor is causing a moral dilemma for the parents and the patient.
